name: John's epoc mod for create ur frisk
name_original: John's epoc mod for create ur frisk
description:
warning! this is not the original game i used, please consider dowloading the game called create your frisk, les go to the desc now:

update! (21/08/2021) and (20/08/2021)

- put an new mode (snas mode)

- put some icons for john (in overworld)

- put an hamburger to you collect

- some kinda of fixes in the game (mostly editing lua scripts and sprites)

- 32 bits version now gamers (if theres an problem, just say in the commentarys)

-heart sprite is more funi now

-bad time not trio mode now gamers

my oc called john is in ut now. haha yes
